summary: Create a modern, clean, trustworthy, business-focused marketing website for a web development & digital solutions company targeting non-technical small and medium-sized business owners, clearly explaining services and generating leads.

existing_features.title: Create a modern, professional, business-focused marketing website for a web development/digital solutions company targeting non-technical small and medium-sized business owners, with clear English copy throughout.
Implement a coherent visual theme (colors, typography, spacing, components) and apply it consistently across all pages/sections; avoid a blue+purple palette.
Add a clear site structure and navigation with at minimum: Home, Services, and Contact sections (as separate routes or anchored sections), plus a persistent header and footer.

Create a Services presentation that includes (verbatim service names): Business brochure websites, Company profile websites, Landing pages, Website redesign, Website maintenance and support; each service must include a brief non-technical description and a CTA to contact.

Add trust-building content sections suitable for non-technical business owners, including at least: a simple process/steps section (e.g., Discover → Design → Build → Launch → Support) and a lightweight FAQ section addressing common concerns (timeline, pricing approach, maintenance).

Implement lead generation via a Contact form that collects at minimum: name, email or phone, business name (optional), service needed (select), message; include client-side validation and a clear success/failure state.
Add one-click inquiry options for WhatsApp and email (mailto), visible near primary CTAs and in the Contact section, with pre-filled message text indicating the user is requesting a website quote.
Connect the frontend Contact form submission to the backend inquiry API using React Query mutation patterns and display submission status to the user.

Add static generated brand visuals and incorporate them into the UI: a simple wordmark logo and a homepage hero illustration, served from frontend/public/assets/generated and referenced directly by the frontend.
Remove the "Experience" and "Projects completed" stats/metrics from the website hero section so they are no longer visible anywhere on the page.

new_feature_requests.summary: Design and build a modern, professional company website for a web development/digital solutions team serving small and medium-sized business clients
Include clear services presentation (brochure sites, company profile sites, landing pages, redesign, maintenance/support)
Add lead generation via contact form plus WhatsApp and email inquiry options
Ensure site content and layout focus on clarity and trust-building for non-technical business owners
Create a backend inquiry submission API in the single Motoko actor to receive contact form submissions and persist them in stable memory for later retrieval.
Remove the "Experience" section and the "Projects completed" section from the website
